metadata.title: CVE-2023-52692 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ALSA: scarlett2: Add missing error check to scarlett2_usb_set_config()scarlett2_usb_set_config() calls scarlett2_usb_get() but was notchecking the result. Return the error if it fails rather thancontinuing with an invalid value.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
